title: Disintegrate
content:
dur's Gate 3. Disintegrate is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Disintegrate Information

Description: Shoot a thin green ray from your finger. If the 50âˆ¼100 Force damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw:
